custom.name: chart.client.portal.total.portal.quotation
custom.title: Quotations
custom.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) as total FROM PortalQuotation self WHERE self.id IN (SELECT MAX(portalQuotation.id) FROM PortalQuotation portalQuotation GROUP BY portalQuotation.saleOrder) AND (self.saleOrder.clientPartner = (SELECT partner FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__) OR self.saleOrder.contactPartner = (SELECT partner FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__)) AND self.statusSelect = 1

custom.name: chart.client.portal.total.invoice
custom.title: Invoices
custom.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) as total FROM Invoice self WHERE self.saleOrder IN (SELECT portalQuotation.saleOrder FROM PortalQuotation portalQuotation) AND (self.partner = (SELECT partner FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__) OR self.contactPartner = (SELECT partner FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__))

custom.name: chart.client.portal.total.announce
custom.title: Announces
custom.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) as total FROM GeneralAnnouncement self INNER JOIN self.partnerCategorySet category WHERE category = (SELECT partner.partnerCategory FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__)

custom.name: chart.client.portal.total.open.ticket
custom.title: Open tickets
custom.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) as total FROM ProjectTask self WHERE COALESCE(self.status.isCompleted, false) = false AND self.typeSelect = 'ticket' AND (self.createdBy = :__user__ OR self.updatedBy = :__user__ OR self.assignedTo = :__user__) AND self.project = (SELECT contextProject FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__)

chart.name: chart.client.portal.sum.invoices.four.months
chart.title: Sum of last 4 months invoices
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.inTaxTotal) AS amount, MONTH(self.invoiceDate) AS month FROM Invoice self WHERE self.invoiceDate >= :fromDate and self.partner = :userPartner GROUP BY MONTH(self.invoiceDate) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.client.portal.project.open.tickets
chart.title: Open tickets
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, self.project.name AS project FROM ProjectTask self WHERE COALESCE(self.status.isCompleted, false) = false and self.typeSelect = 'ticket' AND (self.createdBy = :__user__ OR self.updatedBy = :__user__ OR self.assignedTo = :__user__) AND self.project = (SELECT contextProject FROM User self WHERE self = :__user__) GROUP BY self.project.name

action-view.name: client.portal.total.portal.quatation
action-view.title: Quotations
action-view.domain: self IN (SELECT MAX(id) FROM PortalQuotation portalQuotation GROUP BY portalQuotation.saleOrder) AND (self.saleOrder.clientPartner = :partner OR self.saleOrder.contactPartner = :partner) AND self.statusSelect = :status

action-view.name: client.portal.total.invoices
action-view.title: Invoices
action-view.domain: self.operationTypeSelect = :operationTypeSelect AND self.saleOrder IN (SELECT portalQuotation.saleOrder FROM PortalQuotation portalQuotation) AND (self.partner = :partner OR self.contactPartner = :partner)

action-view.name: client.portal.total.open.ticket
action-view.title: All open tickets
action-view.domain: COALESCE(self.status.isCompleted, false) = false AND self.typeSelect = :typeSelect AND (self.createdBy = :__user__ OR self.updatedBy = :__user__ OR self.assignedTo = :__user__) AND self.project = :project
